text: nī avane (kuṭṭiye) peṭṭiyilākkiyiṭṭ nadiyiliṭṭēkkuka. nadi ā peṭṭi karayil taḷḷikkeāḷḷuṁ. enikkuṁ avannuṁ śatruvāyiṭṭuḷḷa orāḷ avane eṭutt keāḷḷuṁ. (hē; mūsā,) enṟe pakkal ninnuḷḷa snēhaṁ ninṟe mēl ñān iṭṭutarikayuṁ ceytu. enṟe nēāṭṭattilāyikkeāṇṭa nī vaḷarttiyeṭukkappeṭān vēṇṭiyuṁ kūṭiyāṇat‌
